attributes.action: To introduce life skills in to the school curriculum
attributes.background: It can be a difficult change from student to adult and there many assets which are necessary to be a well rounded person. If children in the UK are taught about life skills there may be less confusion later on in life about how to get a job, how to manage a mortgage and how to pay taxes, etc.

rejection.details: We could accept a petition about the teaching of life skills, if you could be more specific about the life skills you would like to be taught.
